{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=DreamPlug (003-DS2001) |revision=V9R1 |asin=B0053GBB5Y |price=159 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=plug computer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.25 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=SanDisk |fla2_model=MicroSD |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G831CFP-S6 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=SD Card, microSD, eSATA 2.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J15 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J8 |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-GH381 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8688 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1; ,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1; ,,, USB Audio I/O Controller;C-Media Electronics;CM108;;1; ,,, 2A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Feeling Technology;FP6163;;4; |flags=Bluetooth 2.1+EDR, SPDIF out, AV in/out, RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2011.06;02334-g8f495d9-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.33.7;Debian 5; |tp_firmware=Debian, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=dream-UAP-XXXX |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=nosoup4u |oui=00:24:23 |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }} :[https://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/p-54-dreamplug-devkit.aspx Product page]
"Dream_Plug_V9R1" and "GLOBALSCALE" is silkscreened on the main board.
